meanings.sent1: My grannie always bakes the best cookies.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my grannie during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: When my grannie tells stories, we all gather around to listen.
meanings.sent4: To me, my grannie is like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The image of my grannie's smiling face is etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for an elderly woman.
meanings.sent1: The kind grannie next door always gives us treats.
meanings.sent2: I waved to the friendly grannie sitting on her porch.
meanings.sent3: My grannie's laughter is contagious and always brightens my day.
meanings.sent4: The old oak tree in the park reminds me of a wise grannie watching over us.
meanings.sent5: The sweet smell of freshly baked pie always reminds me of my grannie's kitchen.
